9.4.18  12:17 am   how do i get over my fear of bugs without doing anything that involves being around them or letting them touch me or anything like that

9.3.18  10:17 pm   my parents dont accept me as trans and the only friends i had that did abandoned me. what can i do to avoid hurting myself?

Â Â Â Â Â it seems like the people who don't accept you are gone now. so now you are free to not only accept yourself, but also accept others and let them accept you

9.3.18  10:01 pm   so i was just browsing expert mode, as one does, and i came to a realization. there was a solid two year streak between "clean my room" (1.10.16) and "la de da" (1.16.16) (of course not including those two videos) that didn't include your face/form/any camera-recorded footage in it at all. i don't know exactly how significant this realization is, but i was wondering if you had had this realization also and what you think of it? any specific reason?

Â Â Â Â Â at least half that time i was working on history of the entire world. another 8th of that time i was working on the reality section. another 8th of that time i was actually working on la de da. for the remaining total 6 months during that time, i would have been either working on history of japan, doing videoless songs, making hi i'm steve which probably shouldn't have had me in it, or making other music videos and assorted content which i did not appear in and for those i have no excuse

9.3.18  5:19 am   okay so here's my dilema. I absoloutley love staying up super late and being awake during the time where it feels like no one else exists. 4:00am is the greatest fucking time of the day. But I also absolouley hate sleeping in. if I wake up on the weekend and it's past 9:45am I am incredibly pissed. What's your opinion.

Â Â Â Â Â i think you may enjoy waking up at 1 am

      Do you have a set sleep schedule or do you kind of just go to sleep whenever you've gotten all the shit you need to get done finished?

Â Â Â Â Â it is a regular schedule which is slightly longer than 24 hours, and therefore drifts forward around the day over the course of several weeks

9.2.18  10:21 pm   hey why is it called a 9 and not a 2? like E9, even though you might be playing it an octave above the other notes

Â Â Â Â Â 9 generally is telling you that the 7 is there too. but if you say 2, there is no assumption that the 7 is there. so if you really want the 2 and 7 to both be there, just saying 9 is kind of like a one shot deal. save you some time there
